problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in ▱ABCD, EF ∥ AB, DE:EA = N_0:N_1, CD = N_2, then the length of EF is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,CD=10,∴AB=10,∵\frac{DE}{EA}=\frac{2}{3},∴\frac{DE}{AD}=\frac{2}{5},∵EF∥AB,∴△DEF∽△DAB,∴\frac{EF}{AB}=\frac{DE}{AD}=\frac{2}{5},即\frac{EF}{10}=\frac{2}{5},解得EF=4．故选:B．
